original_text: Jesus heard about what had happened to John. After that, he went away from that place. He sailed in a boat to a quiet place where he could be alone. But the crowd heard where Jesus had gone. So they left their towns and they went on land to the place where he was going.
korean_text: 예수께서 들으시고 배를 타고 떠나사 따로 빈 들에 가시니 무리가 듣고 여러 고을로부터 걸어서 따라간지라

sentences.original_text: Jesus heard about what had happened to John.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 요한에게 일어난 일에 대해 들으셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: After that, he went away from that place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 예수님은 그 곳을 떠나셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He sailed in a boat to a quiet place
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 조용한 곳으로 배를 타고 가셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the crowd heard where Jesus had gone.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 군중은 예수님이 어디로 가셨는지 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: to the place where he was going.
